long_description: The OluKai Maki Suede shoes have casual sneaker style, yet they can brave bad weather with water-resistant uppers and all-weather outsoles. Premium water-resistant fine-nap suede uppers have moisture-wicking Dri-Lex(R) microfiber synthetic suede linings and durable non-woven heel grip linings. Contoured footbeds with Dri-Lex(R) microfiber synthetic suede covers are removable and washable. All-weather rubber outsoles with heavy gauge sidewall stitching and molded rubber design for traction. Include hand-sewn whipstitch detailing on the heels, and embroidered logos.
short_description: The OluKai Maki Suede shoes have casual sneaker style, yet they can brave bad weather with water-resistant uppers and all-weather outsoles.
